name: Zopim Live Chat Addon
author: Alex Frenkel

sections.description:
Zopim is an facebook-like chatbar built for websites. It connects website owners and visitors together via a cross-browser platform.
This addon adds an option to exclude spesific pages from the addon.

If you dont have a Zopim account yet, please use my link for a referal: Zopim Free Account

Under the hood:

  • Built on Zopim Live Chat 1.1.1.
  • Works with WordPress 3.2 and 3.3 (Checked on this versions)

Enjoy using Zopim Live Chat Addon? Please consider making a small donation to support the software’s continued development.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the zopim-live-chat-addon folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Install the plugin, in the Zopim menu options you will have another menu item named “Zopim Pages Exclusion”.
Add there Pages ID’s separated by commas.
sections.changelog:
0.3

Updated order…

0.2

Fixed order of plugin load error… Moved this to the back.

0.1

  • Initial Alpha Release
